messages.subject: Dishwasher liquid
messages.msgSnippet: Olivia,   I don t know if you are familiar with Shaklee products or not, but they are created by a 50 yr. old company who distributes vitamins, household, and
messages.messageBody:
Olivia, I don't know if you are familiar with Shaklee products or not,
but they are created by a 50 yr. old company who distributes vitamins,
household, and personal care products created with as little impact on
the environment as possible. The ingredients are all biodegradable and
phosphate-free (in the laundry and dishwasher detergents) with the
breakdown time of the laundry detergent being about 6 hrs. Their
dishwasher detergent leaves no residue and works well even in hard water,
and all their products are highly concentrated so that they are much less
expensive than supermarket brands. They also manufacture Basic-H , which
is probably their best known product.
I don't know where you live, but perhaps you can find a Shaklee
distributor near you (these products are not sold in stores). If not, I
can arrange to get you a product guide if you give me your address (my
e-mail is aspang1@...). My family and I have been using Shaklee
products for about two years, and our health has improved tremendously.
